name: Defend the Cat Planet from the alien lungfish invasion
name_original: Defend the Cat Planet from the alien lungfish invasion
description:
The alien lungfish are trying to invade the cat's land to steal mud and O2.

Help cativilization defend its purrnet!!!

We still want to improve this game before the end of this jam, it was a great opportunity for us to learn and use the signs.

Music by joaoppar

Code and concept art by jaspior and KeichiTS

To do:

 - screen shake when hitting a ship or taking damage

 - start animation explaining the game's brief lore
